scr.name: After Create
After Create
scr.script: ddl = "-- After Create script example for table " +table.getLongName(); ddlStatementsList.add(new java.lang.String(ddl));

Copy Comments to Comments in RDBMS

lib.name: my first library
Jruby lib
lib.script: def tables_up(model) tables = model.getTableSet().toArray() for t in 0..tables.length-1 table = tables[t] name = table.getName().upcase table.setName(name) columns = table.getElements() size = table.getElementsCollection().size()-1 for i in 0..size column = columns[i] cname = column.getName().upcase column.setName(cname) end keys = table.getKeys() for i in 0..keys.length-1 key = keys[i] kname = key.getName().upcase key.setName(kname) end end return true end
